title: Person of Interest || Carl Elias - Veni Vidi Vici
author: DJ Motions
comment: I shed a tear when Elias died....main reason why I watched..He was a great character.

9:29 "You think that changes anything? I still won." / "Then why arent you smiling?"

11:50 "You know what your problem is, Harold?"

"No, tell me."
That monologue at the hospital to Simmons ,Wow

Person of interest is one of my favorite shows. The reveal that the humble school teacher was actually the criminal mastermind Elias was great. The show kind of went off the rails in the last few seasons with the AI war but overall I still love the show.
This is amazing!! My favorite character from my favorite series. Elias is such a fantastic character.
description:
If you would like to support me in any extra way: https://www.paypal.me/djmotions1989

This is my video edit about Carl Elias from the TV show Person of Interest. I think I managed to tell his story in this edit. Person of Interest really is an excellent show and I could recommend anyone watching it.

If you like this Carl Elias tribute video leave a thumbs up and a nice comment. Also let me know in the comments what I should watch and video edit on my next project!
